adjectives.description: heterogamous (comparative more heterogamous, superlative most heterogamous)

definitionGroups.group: (botany) in which the stamens and pistils are not present in every flower; i.e. there are male and female flowers

entries.meaning: in the daisy family Asteraceae, having two types of flowers in a flower head (such as some sterile, some hermaphrodite, or some female, some hermaphrodite)
(biology) characterized by alternating generations of a parthenogenetic and sexual nature
(biology) involving heterogametes in the reproductive process
